clinical_history: Patient with chest pain and shortness of breath.
findings: Focal consolidation in left lower lobe with air bronchogram.
Emphysematous changes with hyperlucency in left lower lobe.
Pulmonary embolism suspected; filling defect in segmental artery of left lower lobe.
Fibrotic changes with honeycombing in left lower lobe.
Enlarged lymph nodes in left lower lobe, suggestive of lymphadenopathy.
recommendations: Further evaluation with PET-CT recommended if malignancy suspected.
